content.raw:
It looks like kinetic officially supports gazebo7.

http://wiki.ros.org/kinetic/Migration

Side note: We also make future versions of gazebo available for active ros distributions, where appropriate. 

The primary reason I've dropped the ros tag is that we don't specifically release a version of gazebo into ros. We release into Debian.
content.html:
It looks like kinetic officially supports gazebo7.

http://wiki.ros.org/kinetic/Migration

Side note: We also make future versions of gazebo available for active ros distributions, where appropriate.

The primary reason I've dropped the ros tag is that we don't specifically release a version of gazebo into ros. We release into Debian.
